comments.body: Can you also add a unit test that tests that decode_raw can now successfully decode uint16?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +229,233 @@    unused_image, serialized_example = self.GenerateImage(
        image_format='jpeg', image_shape=image_shape)
    # decode_raw support uint16 now so ValueError will be thrown instead.
    with self.assertRaisesRegexp(
        ValueError,
